Source file src/github.com/Kerrigan-Automation/overmind/\env\gqltype\/timestamp.go

Documentation: github.com/Kerrigan-Automation/overmind/\env\gqltype\ 

     1  package gqltype
     2  
     3  import (
     4  	"fmt"
     5  	"strconv"
     6  	"time"
     7  
     8  	"github.com/99designs/gqlgen/graphql"
     9  )
    10  
    11  const (
    12  	base10       = 10
    13  	sixtyFourBit = 64
    14  )
    15  
    16  func MarshalTimestamp(t time.Time) graphql.Marshaler {
    17  	um := t.UnixMilli()
    18  	return graphql.MarshalInt64(um)
    19  }
    20  
    21  func UnmarshalTimestamp(v interface{}) (time.Time, error) {
    22  	strVal := fmt.Sprint(v)
    23  	intVal, err := strconv.ParseInt(strVal, base10, sixtyFourBit)
    24  	if err != nil {
    25  		return time.Time{}, fmt.Errorf("parsing %v as int64: %w", v, err)
    26  	}
    27  
    28  	return time.UnixMilli(intVal), nil
    29  }
